body.name: Intimate Wash pH 4.2, Skin-Soothing pH Balance Feminine Wash for Every Woman, Feminine Cleansing Wash for Sensitive Skin, 8.78 Ounces
features: Restores Your Natural pH - Gently cleanse your feminine area without affecting its natural flora. This pH balanced wash has Hydrolactol, which helps regulate the natural pH level of your skin, keeping it safe from nasties that thrive in acidic vaginal regions.

Intensive Intimate Care Everyday - Powered with SymCalmin, our pH balance daily intimate wash uses soothing ingredients to fight swelling, odor, and irritation of your pelvic region. Ideal for everyday use, our intimate feminine wash keeps your vaginal area fresh and pampered daily.

Dermatologist Recommended & Made for Every Woman - Our vagina wash is a pH balanced body wash created safe for every woman including menstruating women and new and expecting moms. This dermatologist 5-star award intimate body wash contains the safest ingredients suitable for sensitive skin prone to irritation.

No Harsh Ingredients - Ditch drying and pore-clogging cleansers! A good feminine wash for all skin types even for extremely sensitive skin, this vaginal wash does not contain soap, parabens, mineral oils, paraffin oils, or dyes. It locks in moisture and keeps your skin away from irritants.

Animal and Environment-Safe - This feminine body wash is made with care for you and the planet. Our feminine wash for women is formulated to perfection without performing animal trials. Consciously and ethically made, it’s climate neutral, too.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: For Safe yet Effective Cleansing and Care This skin-soothing intimate wash is suitable for skins of varying sensitivity levels. It is gentle enough for use during pregnancy, postpartum, and menstrual discomfort. An Innovative Recipe Our intimate cleanser for women uses three main ingredients designed to mildly yet effectively cleanse the intimate areas.

Matches Your Skin’s pH Level Our feminine products wash the intimate region without attacking the skin’s acid mantle. With a pH level of 4.2, this pH balance intimate wash maintains the natural moisture barrier and defense of your sensitive area.
Dermatologist Tested - 5-Star Excellent Award The highest quality guarantied.Made in Germany.

Created for Your Different Feminine Needs Numis Med Intimate Wash uses advanced technology and a complex breakthrough formulation that soothes and cleanses the intimate areas while stabilizing the pH range. And you can use it: dailyduring menstruate cycleduring pregnancyafter child birth Directions for Use Mix our feminine balance wash with lukewarm water. Cleanse the genital area then rinse thoroughly. Give your intimate area the gentle care it deserves with Numis Med Intimate Wash!
For the best using benefits, check out the entire Numis Med Sensitive line with the promise of the followings: VeganParaben FreeCruelty FreeSoap FreeMineral oils FreeParaffin oils FreeDyes Free
Numis Med Ph5.5 line is good for you and the earth!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Try this as a body wash.
reviews.reviewText: This product has changed how I think about skincare. Based on my personal experience, it seems like low PH body wash is the answer for the dryness and itchiness caused by health conditions or injury.For it’s intended purpose, this is the best intimate wash I’ve tried. It corrected my imbalance on the first use and I really enjoy the smell. When you’re in the shower it smells a tad bit like glue, but once your out the smell starts to change and an hour later it smells really good.I started using this as a body wash two months ago after acute kidney injury made crazy itchy and dry. My skin was immediately relieved as I was lathering.…Then I got a second degree sunburn on my entire front side. We’re talking purple-black sunburn with open wounds. This relieved much of the pain and my sunburn healed surprisingly fast. I’m going to seek out a low PH lotion to use with this, but this is now my go to body and intimate wash.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Nice Product
reviews.reviewText: I have tried many feminine products/ or products in general that are supposed to be for your delicate area below. However, by far- this is the best one. I have only had it for a short time and already know that I will be re-ordering. This is truly made for cleaning that area (my experience only). I have tried soaps: Dove/Caress/Unscented blah blah's- no matter what they say, I'm convinced that soap you clean your body with does not work well in that area. Only makes it itchy or irritated with the harsh chemicals, causing a uncomfortable day ahead. I have tried Cetaphil skin cleanser, though this did not irritate me; it didn't make me feel clean. I've tried Dherbs soap- "Yoni Soap", this does make you feel clean, however, my first experience with that was horrific. You really have to prepare yourself with that soap, as I almost threw it away as it was very harsh on me at first; but like all products I buy- I try to give them a little while before passing full judgement. I've tried the Johnson & Johnson baby washes- they are are nice, however, being a woman, I want to smell like a woman not a baby- and your expectations for using baby washes mirror who it is intended for. Anyways, my point is- try this. I did not have any bad reaction, itch, rash, burn, or anything. It makes you feel extremely clean and fresh with a light scent. You don't smell like a vagina and you don't smell like a flower down below- just clean. Whatever you smelt like before your shower/bath you will certainly enjoy how refreshed you feel after using this. This really cuts any smell away, lathers well, and just makes you feel clean. You even feel refreshed throughout the day after using this. Luckily, I was able to use during my cycle- and I must say, this is very very nice. Glad I tried this!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: So wonderful and soothing. Works well and doesn’t irritate. Highly recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 7, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Didn't have any problems, until I tested its PH. Still is gentle though.
reviews.reviewText: This hasn't cured my BV or anything... But it has helped for sure. I am SO sensitive... there isn't any type of wash I was even willing to try if it had soap or a specific scent to it. Even if something helps my feminine area, if it isn't BABY gentle it will give me a UTI. So I gave up the idea of using any cleansers 'down there'. Been using this pretty regularly for a few weeks. I am in a newer relationship so I really try and use this any time after intercourse (which is a lot, so my BV has been acting up). It definitely helps and sooths if I feel any irritation or itch. And it helps keep me smelling clean down there. No UTI yet! So I am one happy customer. Still working on finding a complete routine that fixes my PH issues all together... But this will definitely be a part of that routine, as long as no issues arise in the future (I will update if that happens). Baby steps to getting healthy :) Finger's crossed! Give this a try if you feel you are impossibly sensitive and have given up hope with cleansers, like me. Good luck ladies <3!
